<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cast Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=281) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 123 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font or healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down. If the next action you use is to cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) to damage one creature, the target is knocked prone if it takes any damage from the spell. If the target critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.
name: Cast Down
